title: Affodable Luxury! Easy Hwy Access! Wood Flooring! Granite!
posting_body: Located between Dallas and Fort Worth in East Grand Prairie, TX.
Our 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartment homes and town homes are rich in amenities and offer spacious floor plans with crown molding, nine foot ceilings and wall sconce lighting.
Located minutes away from I-30 and Toll Road 161.

Community Amenities: Perimeter Fence, Outdoor Grills, Picnic Area, Dog Park, State Of The Art Fitness Center, Luxurious Clubhouse with Billiards and Wireless Internet, Gated Entrance, Sparkling Pool, Business Center

Unit Amenities: Cable ready, Walk-in closets, Storage Closet Outside, W/D, Ice makers, Wood Flooring, Granite, Stainless Steel Appliances, Frost Free Refrigerators, Garbage Disposals, Miniblinds, Dishwashers, Private Patios/Balconies, Ceiling Fans, Microwaves, Self cleaning Ovens, Pantry, and Much More
